apps.name: JavDB
apps.subtitle: Online Information source for adult movies.
apps.versionDescription:
English
• TOP250 add more filtering options, video details add multiple rankings
• Offline videos replay support
• AV consultation add related videos, convenient to reach quickly
• First screen “Change a group” button moved to the bottom of the column, convenient for one-hand operation
• Add date display to the first screen of “good movie recommendation”
• Change the preview bar to black when browsing large pictures in light color mode
• Update the description of short comment rule
• Fixed the issue with “Play automatically landscape” in settings
• Fixed the issue with jumping video list in search result page
• Fixed the problem that clicking the magnetic chain can't bring up the Bittorrent App
• Other issues fixed and optimized

Chinese
• TOP250 增加更多篩選項，影片詳情增加多個排行
• 已離線影片支持續播
• AV 咨訊增加關聯影片，方便快速直達
• 首屏「換一組」按鈕移到欄目下方，方便單手操作
• 首屏「佳片推薦」增加日期顯示
• 淺色模式大圖瀏覽時下方預覽圖欄改為黑色
• 短評規則說明更新
• 修正設置中的「播放自動橫屏」問題
• 修正搜索結果頁影片列表跳動問題
• 修正點擊磁鏈無法喚起比特球 App 的問題
• 其他問題修正和優化
apps.localizedDescription: JavDB, the most comprehensive online database of adult videos, and you can search and view all of adult videos in Japan with Censored, Uncensored, Western, Anime and FC2.
